value.title: Get your Power BI Report Server Product Key (Minute Monday)

value.title: Inside Power Query reference queries for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Chris Webb joins Patrick to look at what happens when you use reference queries for Power Query. This applies to both Power BI and Excel.
